gurmukhi: soBq pwn kiRpwn aujwrI ]jw qn ieMdR koit keI KMfy ibSn kRor qiRpurwrI ]
transliteration: Sobhat Paan Kridaan Ujdaree|| Jaa Tan Indra Kottee Kai Khande Bishan Daror Tripurdaree||
translation: There is that sword in His hand, which had chopped crores of Vishnus, Indras and Shivas;

gurmukhi: jwkhu rwm aucr mun jn sB syvq iDAwn lgwey ]qs qum rwm kiRSn keI koitk bwr aupwie imtwey ]6]80]
transliteration: Jaakauh Raam Ouchar Mounndjan Sabh Sevat Dhiaan Lagade|| Tas Toum Raam Krishan Kaikotik Baar Oupaae Mitaae||6||80||
translation: The sages meditate on that sword-like power; O Power ! You created heroes like Rama and Krishna many times and destroyer them many times.6.80.

gurmukhi: AnBv rUp srUp AgMjn kho kvn ibD g`eIXY ]ijhbw shMsR rtq gun QwkI kib ijhvyk bq`eIXY ]
transliteration: Anbhav Roop Saroop Agadjan Kaho Kavan Bidh Gadeeeyai|| Jihbaa Sahanstra Ratat Goun Thaakikabi Jihvek Bataeeeeyai||
translation: Your figure is a thing of perception; how can I sing about it?; the tongue of the poet sings about your thousands of qualities and gets tired;

gurmukhi: BUm AkwS pqwr jvn kr caudh KMf ibhMfy ]jgmg joq hoq BUqil mY KMfn Aau bHmMfy ]7]81]
transliteration: Bhoom Akaadh Pataar Javan Kar Chaudah Khannd Bihande|| Jagmag Jot Hot Bhootal(i) Mai Khadnan Au Brahmande||7||81||
translation: He, who destroyers the earth, sky nether-world and the fourteen world, the Light of that Power is shining everywhere.781.

gurmukhi: jY jY rUp AryK Apwr ]jwis pwie BRmwie jh qh BIK ko iSv duAwr ]
transliteration: Jai Jai Roopdarekh Apaar|| Jaas(i) Paae Bhramaae Jih Tah Bheekh Ko Shiv Duaar||
translation: His form is infinite and beyond dimension; even Shiva is begging and wandering for his realization;

gurmukhi: jwis pwie lgXo inSySih kwrmwqn eyk ]dyvqyS mhMsR By Bg jwis pwie Anyk ]8]82]
transliteration: Jaas(i) Paae Lagyo Nisheshah(i) Kaarmaatan Ek Devtesh Sahansra Bhe Bhag Jaas(i) Paae Anek||8||82||
translation: Chandra is also lying at His feet and for His realization Indra had got marks of a thousand genital organs of woman on his body.8.82.

gurmukhi: kiRSn rwm Bey ikqy pun kwl pwie ibhwn ]kwl ko An kwl kY AklMk mUrq mwn ]
transliteration: Krishan Raam Bhae Kite Poun Kaal Paae Bihaan|| Kaal Ko An Kaal Kai Aklank Moondat Maan||
translation: Because of the impact of KAL, many Krishna and Ramas have been created, but KAL himself is indestructible and blemishless;

gurmukhi: jwis pwie BXo sBY jg jws pwie iblwn ]qwih qY Aibcwr jV krqwr kwih n jwn ]9]83]
transliteration: Jaas(i) Paae Bhayo Sobhai Jag Jaas Paae Bilaan|| Taah(i) Tai Abichaar Jad Kartaar Kaah(i) Na Jaan||9||83||
translation: He, with the impact of whose Feel, the world is created and destroyed, O fool ! why do you not pray to Him, considering Him as the creator?.9.83.

gurmukhi: nrhir jwn kwih n lyq ]qY Bros prXo pSU ijh moih b`iD Acyq ]
transliteration: Nar-har Jaan Kkaah(i) Na Let|| Tai Bdaros Daryo Pashoo Jih Moh(i) Baddh(i) Achet||
translation: O being ! Why do you not comprehend the Lord and are lying unconscious in attachment under the impact of maya?

gurmukhi: rwm kiRSn rsUl ko auiT lyq inqpRq nwau ]khw vY Ab jIAq jg mY khw iqn ko gwau ]10]84]
transliteration: Raam Krishan Rasool Ko Outh(i) Let Nitprat Naao|| Kahaa Vai Ab Jeeat Jag Mai Kahaa Tin Ko Gado||10||84||
translation: O being ! You always remember the names of Rama, Krishna and Rasul, tell me, are they alive and is there any abode of theirs in the world?10.84.
